info.title: Webpageanalyse
info.description: We offer several endpoints to analyze webpages. Use our API to find similar sites for a domain, detect if a domain contains adult content, detect the category of a domain or find the Pagerank for a domain.

get.description: Detect if a domain has adult content or not

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: domain to detect if it has adult content or not

get.description: Categorize a webpage. It can find multiple categories for a webpage.
Find the Google Pagerank for any domain. Also provides historic values for the Pagerank.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to get the page rank for

get.description: Find similar sites for a given domain

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain to find similar sites for
